message:
SYSTEM: 2020.03.OEG.pdf: Página 27
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask
Bureaucracy
27
Prepare in advance what you need:
• Food bills?
• Flight tickets?
• Local paperwork (eg Vienna).
• Certificate signed by host
(IN BLUE).
• Report with stamp? (always
the original!)
• Conditions on paper
signature / aknowledgments.
Check the deadlines:
• Usually X days after the return.
• But sometimes also THERE                                       
(Erasmus).
ALSO, KEEP ALWAYS THE ORIGINAL REPORTS/CERTIFICATE.
speaker: SYSTEM
